about_the_game:
Desckstrander is a survival + deck building + story generator game where you draw cards to survive, build and fight creatures.

Building

You begin with a survivor stranded on an unknown island, build shelters & functional buildings to sustain living & fend off enemies.

Crafting

Combine different cards into new card ( materials, weapons, buildings, tools, and more. )

Hunting / Food gathering

Craft weapons for survivors to hunt for animals, or simply tools to gather food resource.

Farming & Vegetation

Plant and harvest your crops, or simply growing nice looking greens for gardening aesthetic.

Capture & Slavery

Pirates may come and capture survivors and traded to the black market. Beware, it is all happening in dark.

Pet Taming

Tame wild creatures into pet for adorable looks, domesticated farm animals, or simply as defensive beast.

Deckstrander is a deck building + story generator game.

It's heavily relying on card combination into crafting new cards, OR you could simply harvest those materials in game. The story generator has some designed events that are randomly generated over the gameplay. Each character has his own personality and traits that drive towards different decision and reaction to the situation in the storyline.

There is no exact definition of ultimate goal, you could live off forever by building enough sustainable lifestyle, keep survivors and creatures happy, or kill the strongest sea creature to declare victory at your own pace, or simply find enough materials to eventually craft a boat to escape the island, and many more.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra (version 10.13)
  • Processor: 64-bit processor OS.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or above, recommended to have a graphic card.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
